meanings.definition: A protective covering used to catch paint drips or spills.
meanings.sent1: During the painting project, we spread out the dropcloths to keep the floor clean.
meanings.sent2: The painter carefully placed the dropcloths under the furniture to avoid any spills.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat thought the dropcloths were a fun playground, sliding around on them.
meanings.sent4: The dropcloths were like vigilant guardians, shielding the floor from any paint mishaps.
meanings.sent5: The bright red dropcloths stood out against the white walls, a stark contrast in the room.

meanings.definition: Sheets or cloths placed on the floor to protect it from damage or dirt.
meanings.sent1: Before starting the renovation, the workers laid down the dropcloths to safeguard the floor.
meanings.sent2: The dropcloths were essential in preventing any scratches or stains on the hardwood floor.
meanings.sent3: The dropcloths transformed the room into a makeshift picnic area, adding a touch of whimsy.
meanings.sent4: As the storm raged outside, the dropcloths shielded the floor like a sturdy fortress.
meanings.sent5: The dropcloths absorbed the paint splatters like thirsty sponges, leaving the floor spotless.
